verses.roman:
śuni prabhura vākya govinda mauna karilā
prātaḥ-kāle jagadānanda prabhu-sthāne āilā

synonyms: śuni—hearing; prabhura vākya—the statement of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; govinda—Govinda; mauna karilā—remained silent; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; prabhu-sthāne—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—came.
translation: Hearing these words of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Govinda remained silent. The next morning, Jagadānanda went to see the Lord.
